plot: Ann oversees a team of female police officers who head off trouble before it occurs, much to the dismay of their stodgy precinct captain, who dislikes their gentle methods of fighting crime.
title: Ann in Blue
plot_es: Ann oversees a team of female police officers who head off trouble before it occurs, much to the dismay of their stodgy precinct captain, who dislikes their gentle methods of fighting crime.
plot_en: Ann oversees a team of female police officers who head off trouble before it occurs, much to the dismay of their stodgy precinct captain, who dislikes their gentle methods of fighting crime.
